title: Havel Power of the Powerless MCQ 2

content.question: As expressed in the passage, Havel’s vision of effecting change in the communist bloc was most consistent with which of the following developments?

choices.label: State-led programs to increase press freedom and provide greater transparency on past and present political decisions, such as Gorbachev’s glasnost policies
Market-oriented measures to stimulate private initiative and make state-run plants and factories more competitive, such as Deng Xiaoping’s economic reforms in China
Grassroots citizens’ organizations forming to protest the economic and social injustices in the Communist bloc, such as the Solidarity labor union in Poland
Violent disintegration of states deemed illegitimate or artificially created, such as the collapse of Yugoslavia

content.answer: Grassroots citizens’ organizations forming to protest the economic and social injustices in the Communist bloc, such as the Solidarity labor union in Poland

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
